so at Pinnacle we help customers with
their cloud migration projects I mean
our view is that our customers need to
focus on innovating and we help them to
do that by helping them leverage the
tools and services that AWS provides
redneck consulting is a cloud only in
cloud first IT provider we focus on
small to medium sized businesses we are
a 35 year old systems integrator and we
are focused on cloud architecture and
DevOps and cyber security and network
infrastructure
our distributor partner had a lot of
experience with other partners like us
they're able to allow us to accelerate
our growth within the APM program they
saves us from making a lot of early
mistakes and gave us good guidance as
far as how to become an AWS partner and
also helped us learn the in and outs of
the APM program this allowed us to move
very rapidly up the part of different
partner levels with an APN one key
additional area that we get help from
our distribution partner is in the area
of training and certification we have a
substantial engineering team and that's
a huge asset for us but in addition to
being a big asset for us it can be very
expensive to provide training for those
engineers so we we've received help in
terms of access to training and
oftentimes that training has been
provided at either little or no cost to
us RedNet consulting does quite a bit of
small business networking and migrations
to Amazon Web Services and the
distributor that we work with has
provided us with a toolset that allows
us very easily to see their utilization
their billing and help them govern their
web usage and keep their bills under
control and those tool sets have really
allowed us to scale very rapidly and
bring customers on board very quickly
one of our large clients in particular
came to us and they had a fairly sizable
presence on AWS but it had developed
organically and they wanted us to make
an assessment and provide them with a
more structured plan for growth we went
to our distribution resource and got
access to some some tools that helped us
to assess the extent of their instances
work and how we could rationalize them
and right-size them and we did that our
client is has been very happy with us
and has expanded their business with us
and expanded their business with AWS we
recently had a large customer migration
where we had a very short time period to
do the migration in the distributor we
work with was able to connect us very
rapidly to other partners that have done
the same type of project we have connect
us with tool sets that helped us
optimize the migration and that customer
was very happy at the end of the day
because we were able to move aging
architecture of servers that were
end-of-life and out of support into AWS
over a weekend one example of working
with our distribution partner is we had
a customer that had a sprawling AWS
environment they didn't have two
controls over accounts or security or
best practices by leveraging our
distribution partner and the platform
they brought it brought the table we
were able to you know rapidly help this
customer better understand their AWS
environment it gave them visibility into
security and the services that they were
using and I feel that you know without
the visibility and security and
governance that we were able to provide
